title: Baseball Mud Bath, Water Woes and Wooden Satellites
description: A wooden solution to metal satellites polluting space. Water woes create droughts in 48 of the 50 U.S. states—and climate change is of course a culprit. Microplastics could make wastewater recycling more challenging.
